sql: SELECT MIN(mi_idx.info) AS rating, MIN(t.title) AS movie_title FROM info_type AS it, keyword AS k, movie_info_idx AS mi_idx, movie_keyword AS mk, title AS t WHERE it.info ='rating' AND k.keyword  like '%sequel%' AND mi_idx.info  > '2.0' AND t.production_year > 1990 AND t.id = mi_idx.movie_id AND t.id = mk.movie_id AND mk.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id AND k.id = mk.keyword_id AND it.id = mi_idx.info_type_id;
hint_str:
/*+ HashJoin(t mk mi_idx it k)
 HashJoin(t mk mi_idx it)
 MergeJoin(t mk mi_idx)
 HashJoin(t mk)
 TidScan(t)
 SeqScan(mk)
 IndexScan(mi_idx)
 IndexScan(it)
 SeqScan(k)
 Leading(((((t mk) mi_idx) it) k)) */
